metadata.name: VanillaRemade
author: Jayd
metadata.description: All vanilla jokers, remade with JokerForge.

jokers.name: Joker
jokers.description: {C:mult}+4{} Mult

jokers.name: Greedy Joker
jokers.description: Played cards with {C:orange}Diamond{} suit give {C:mult}+3{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Lusty Joker
jokers.description: Played cards with {C:red}Heart{} suit give {C:mult}+3{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Wrathful Joker
jokers.description: Played cards with Spade suit give {C:mult}+3{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Gluttonous Joker
jokers.description: Played cards with Club suit give {C:mult}+3{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Jolly Joker
jokers.description: {C:mult}+8{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Pair{}

jokers.name: Zany Joker
jokers.description: {C:mult}+12{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Three of a Kind{}

jokers.name: Mad Joker
jokers.description: {C:mult}+10{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Two Pair{}

jokers.name: Crazy Joker
jokers.description: {C:mult}+12{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Straight{}

jokers.name: Droll Joker
jokers.description: {C:mult}+10{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Flush{}

jokers.name: Sly Joker
jokers.description: {C:chips}+50{} Chips if played hand contains a {C:orange}Pair{}

jokers.name: Wily Joker
jokers.description: {C:chips}+100{} Chips if played hand contains a {C:orange}Three of a Kind{}

jokers.name: Clever Joker
jokers.description: {C:chips}+80{} Chips if played hand contains a {C:orange}Two Pair{}

jokers.name: Devious Joker
jokers.description: {C:chips}+100{} Chips if played hand contains a {C:orange}Straight{}

jokers.name: Crafty Joker
jokers.description: {C:chips}+80{} Chips if played hand contains a {C:orange}Flush{}

jokers.name: Half Joker
jokers.description: {C:mult}+20{} Mult if played hand contains {C:orange}3{} or fewer cards

jokers.name: Mystic Summit
jokers.description: {C:mult}+15{} Mult when {C:orange}0{} discards remaining

jokers.name: Marble Joker
jokers.description: Adds one {C:orange}Stone{} card to the deck when {C:orange}Blind{} is selected

jokers.name: 8 Ball
jokers.description: {C:green}1 in 4{} chance for each played {C:orange}8{} to create a {C:purple}Tarot{} card when scored[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

jokers.name: Dusk
jokers.description: Retrigger all played cards in {C:orange}final hand{} of the round

jokers.name: Fibonacci
jokers.description: Each played {C:orange}Ace{}, {C:orange}2{}, {C:orange}3{}, {C:orange}5{}, or {C:orange}8{} gives {C:mult}+8{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Scary Face
jokers.description: Played {C:orange}face{} cards give {C:chips}+30{} Chips when scored

jokers.name: Hack
jokers.description: Retrigger each played {C:orange}2{}, {C:orange}3{}, {C:orange}4{}, or {C:orange}5{}

jokers.name: Gros Michel
jokers.description: {C:mult}+15{} Mult[s]{C:green}1 in 6{} chance this is destroyed at the end of round.

jokers.name: Even Steven
jokers.description: Played cards with {C:orange}even{} rank give {C:mult}+4{} Mult when scored[s]{C:inactive}(10, 8, 6, 4, 2){}

jokers.name: Odd Todd
jokers.description: Played cards with {C:orange}odd{} rank give {C:chips}+31{} Chips when scored[s]{C:inactive}(A, 9, 7, 5, 3){}

jokers.name: Scholar
jokers.description: Played Aces give {C:chips}+20{} Chips and {C:mult}+4{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Business Card
jokers.description: Played {C:orange}face{} cards have a {C:green}1 in 2{} chance to give {C:money}$2{} when scored

jokers.name: Ride the Bus
jokers.description: This Joker gains {C:mult}+1{} Mult per {C:orange}consecutive{} hand played without a scoring {C:orange}face{} card[s]{C:inactive}(Currently [[multvar]] Mult){}

jokers.name: Burglar
jokers.description: When {C:orange}Blind{} is selected, gain {C:orange}+3{} Hands and {C:orange}lose all discards{}

jokers.name: Runner
jokers.description: Gains {C:chips}+15{} Chips if played hand contains a {C:orange}Straight{}[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:blue}+#1#{} Chips){}

jokers.name: Superposition
jokers.description: Create a {C:purple}Tarot{} card if poker hand contains an {C:orange}Ace{} and a {C:orange}Straight{}[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

jokers.name: Red Card
jokers.description: This Joker gains {C:mult}+3{} Mult when any {C:orange}Booster Pack{} is skipped[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:red}+#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Square Joker
jokers.description: This Joker gains {C:chips}+4{} Chips if played hand has exactly {C:orange}4{} cards[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:blue}#1#{} Chips){}

jokers.name: Séance
jokers.description: If {C:orange}poker hand{} is a {C:orange}Straight Flush{}, create a random {C:spectral}Spectral{} card[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

jokers.name: Vampire
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.1{} Mult per scoring {C:orange}Enhanced card{} played,[s] removes card {C:orange}Enhancement{}[s]{C:inactive[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Bull
jokers.description: {C:blue}+2{} Chips for each $1 you have[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:blue}+#1#{} Chips){}

jokers.name: Diet Cola
jokers.description: Sell this card to create a free {C:attention}Double Tag{}

jokers.name: Flash Card
jokers.description: This Joker gains {C:red}+2{} Mult per reroll in the shop[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:red}+#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Banner
jokers.description: {C:blue}+30{} Chips for each remaining {C:attention}discard{}

jokers.name: Delayed Gratification
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$2{} per {C:attention}discard{}[s] if no discards are used by end of the round

jokers.name: Faceless Joker
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$5{} if {C:attention}3{} or more {C:attention}face cards{} are discarded at the same time

jokers.name: Erosion
jokers.description: {C:red}+4{} Mult for each card below {C:attention}[the deck's starting size]{} in your full deck[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:red}+#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Campfire
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.25{} Mult for each card {C:attention}sold{},[s] resets when {C:attention}Boss Blind{} is defeated[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Invisible Joker
jokers.description: After {C:attention}2{} rounds, sell this card to {C:attention}Duplicate{} a random Joker[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:attention}#1#{}/2){}[s]{C:inactive}(Removes Negative from copy){}

jokers.name: Vagabond
jokers.description: Create a {C:purple}Tarot{} card if hand is played with {C:money}$4{} or less

jokers.name: Rocket
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$1{} at end of round. Payout increases by {C:money}$2{} when {C:orange}Boss Blind{} is defeated

jokers.name: Midas Mask
jokers.description: All played {C:orange}face{} cards become {C:orange}Gold{} cards when scored

jokers.name: Photograph
jokers.description: First played {C:orange}face{} card gives {X:red,C:white}X2{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Hallucination
jokers.description: {C:green}1 in 2{} chance to create a {C:purple}Tarot{} card when any {C:orange}Booster Pack{} is opened[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

jokers.name: Drunkard
jokers.description: {C:red}+1{} discard each round

jokers.name: Ramen
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X2{} Mult, loses {X:red,C:white}X0.01{} Mult per {C:orange}card{} discarded

jokers.name: Burnt Joker
jokers.description: Upgrade the level of the first {C:orange}discarded{} poker hand each round

jokers.name: Merry Andy
jokers.description: {C:red}+3{} discards each round, {C:red}-1{} hand size

jokers.name: Turtle Bean
jokers.description: {C:orange}+5{} hand size, reduces by {C:red}1{} each round

jokers.name: Juggler
jokers.description: {C:orange}+1{} hand size

jokers.name: Popcorn
jokers.description: {C:mult}+20{} Mult[s]{C:mult}-4{} Mult per round played

jokers.name: Spare Trousers
jokers.description: This Joker gains {C:mult}+2{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Two Pair{}[s]{C:inactive}(Currently +0 Mult){}

jokers.name: Seltzer
jokers.description: Retrigger all cards played for the next {C:orange}10{} hands

jokers.name: Smiley Face
jokers.description: Played {C:orange}face{} cards give {C:mult}+5{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Golden Ticket
jokers.description: Played {C:orange}Gold{} cards earn {C:money}$4{} when scored

jokers.name: Acrobat
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult on {C:orange}final hand{} of round

jokers.name: Sock and Buskin
jokers.description: Retrigger all played {C:orange}face{} cards

jokers.name: Troubadour
jokers.description: {C:orange}+2{} hand size,[s]{C:orange}-1{} hand per round

jokers.name: Throwback
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X0.25{} Mult for each {C:orange}Blind{} skipped this run[s]{C:inactive}(Currently X1 Mult){}

jokers.name: Hanging Chad
jokers.description: Retrigger {C:orange}first{} played card used in scoring {C:orange}2{} additional times

jokers.name: Rough Gem
jokers.description: Played cards with {C:orange}Diamond{} suit earn {C:money}$1{} when scored

jokers.name: Bloodstone
jokers.description: {C:green}#1# in #2#{} chance for played cards with {C:red}Heart{} suit[s] to give {X:red,C:white}X1.5{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Arrowhead
jokers.description: Played cards with {C:inactive}Spade{} suit give {C:chips}+50{} Chips when scored

jokers.name: Onyx Agate
jokers.description: Played cards with {C:chips}Club{} suit give {C:mult}+7{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Flower Pot
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult if poker hand contains a  Diamond card,  Club card,  Heart card, and  Spade card

jokers.name: Seeing Double
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X2{} Mult if played hand has a scoring {C:chips}Club{} card and a scoring card of any other suit

jokers.name: Hit the Road
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.5{} Mult for every {C:orange}Jack{} discarded this round[s]{C:inactive}(Currently X1 Mult){}

jokers.name: The Duo
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X2{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Pair{}

jokers.name: The Trio
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Three of a Kind{}

jokers.name: The Order
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Straight{}

jokers.name: The Tribe
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X2{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Flush{}

jokers.name: The Family
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X4{} Mult if played hand contains a {C:orange}Four of a Kind{}

jokers.name: Stuntman
jokers.description: {C:chips}+250{} Chips,[s]{C:orange}-2{} hand size

jokers.name: Cartomancer
jokers.description: Create a {C:purple}Tarot{} card when {C:orange}Blind{} is selected[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

jokers.name: Triboulet
jokers.description: Played Kings and Queens each give {X:red,C:white}X2{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Yorick
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X1{} Mult every {C:orange}23{} {C:inactive}[23]{} cards discarded[s]{C:inactive}(Currently X1 Mult){}

jokers.name: Mr. Bones
jokers.description: Prevents Death if Chips scored[s] are at least {C:attention}25%{} of required Chips[s]{C:red}self destructs{}

jokers.name: Bootstraps
jokers.description: {C:red}+2{} Mult for every {C:money}$5{} you have[s]{C:inactive}(Currently +0 Mult){}

jokers.name: Obelisk
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.2{} Mult per[s] {C:attention}consecutive{} hand played without playing[s] your most played {C:attention}poker hand{}[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X1{} Mult){}

jokers.name: To the Moon
jokers.description: Earn an extra {C:money}$1{} of {C:attention}interest{}[s] for every {C:attention}$5{} you have at end of round

jokers.name: Satellite
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$1{} at end of round per[s] unique {C:planet}Planet{} card used this run

jokers.name: Egg
jokers.description: Gains {C:money}$3{} of {C:attention}sell value{} at end of round

jokers.name: Gift Card
jokers.description: Add {C:money}$1{} of {C:attention}sell value{} to every[s] {C:attention}Joker{} and {C:attention}Consumable{} card at end of round

jokers.name: Misprint
jokers.description: {C:red}+0-23{} Mult

jokers.name: Mail-In Rebate
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$5{} for each discarded {C:attention}#1#{},[s] rank changes every round

jokers.name: Ancient Joker
jokers.description: Each played card with {C:attention}#1#{} gives {X:red,C:white}X1.5{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Castle
jokers.description: This Joker gains {C:blue}+3{} Chips per discarded {C:attention}#1#{} card,[s] suit changes every round[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:blue}+#2#{} Chips){}

jokers.name: The Idol
jokers.description: Each played {C:attention}#2#{} of {C:attention}#1#{} gives {X:red,C:white}X2{} Mult when scored[s]Card changes every round

jokers.name: Chaos the Clown
jokers.description: {C:attention}1{} free {C:green}Reroll{} per shop

jokers.name: Astronomer
jokers.description: All {C:planet}Planet{} cards and {C:planet}Celestial Packs{}[s] in the shop are {C:attention}free{}

jokers.name: Pareidolia
jokers.description: All cards are considered {C:attention}face{} cards

jokers.name: Smeared Joker
jokers.description: {C:hearts}Hearts{} and  {C:diamonds}Diamonds{} count as the same suit,[s]  {C:spades}Spades{} and  {C:clubs}Clubs{} count as the same suit

jokers.name: Sixth Sense
jokers.description: If {C:attention}first hand{} of round is a single {C:attention}6{},[s] destroy it and create a {C:spectral}Spectral{} card[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

jokers.name: To Do List
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$4{} if {C:attention}poker hand{} is a {C:attention}#1#{},[s] poker hand changes at end of round

jokers.name: Blueprint
jokers.description: Copies ability of {C:attention}Joker{} to the right

jokers.name: Brainstorm
jokers.description: Copies the ability of leftmost {C:attention}Joker{}

jokers.name: Hiker
jokers.description: Every played {C:attention}card{} permanently[s] gains {C:blue}+5{} Chips when scored

jokers.name: Ceremonial Dagger
jokers.description: When {C:attention}Blind{} is selected, destroy Joker to[s] the right and permanently add[s] {C:attention}double{} its sell value to this {C:red}Mult{}[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:red}+#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Certificate
jokers.description: When round begins, add a random {C:attention}playing card{}[s] with a random {C:attention}seal{} to your hand

jokers.name: DNA
jokers.description: If {C:attention}first hand{} of round has only {C:attention}1{} card,[s] add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to {C:attention}hand{}

jokers.name: Canio
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X1{} Mult[s] when a {C:attention}face{} card is destroyed[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Glass Joker
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.75{} Mult for[s] every {C:attention}Glass Card{} that is destroyed[s](Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult)

jokers.name: Mime
jokers.description: Retrigger all card {C:orange}held in hand{} abilities

jokers.name: Constellation
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.1{} Mult[s] every time a {C:planet}Planet{} card is used[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Card Sharp
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult if played {C:attention}poker hand{}[s] has already been played this round

jokers.name: Matador
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$8{} if played hand triggers the {C:attention}Boss Blind{} ability

jokers.name: Oops! All 6s
jokers.description: Doubles all {C:attention}listed{} {C:green}probabilities{}[s](ex: {C:green}1 in 3{} -> {C:green}2 in 3{})

jokers.name: Splash
jokers.description: Every {C:attention}played card{} counts in scoring

jokers.name: Lucky Cat
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.25{} Mult every[s] time a {C:attention}Lucky{} card {C:green}successfully{} triggers[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Drivers License
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult if you have at least[s] {C:attention}16{} {C:enhanced}Enhanced{} cards in your full deck[s]{C:inactive}(Currently #1#){}

jokers.name: Trading Card
jokers.description: If {C:attention}first discard{} of round has only {C:attention}1{} card,[s] destroy it and earn {C:money}$3{}

jokers.name: Hologram
jokers.description: This Joker gains {X:red,C:white}X0.25{} Mult every[s] time a {C:attention}playing card{} is added to your deck[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Credit Card
jokers.description: Go up to {C:red}-$20{} in debt

jokers.name: Four Fingers
jokers.description: All {C:attention}Flushes{} and {C:attention}Straights{} can be made with 4 cards

jokers.name: Shortcut
jokers.description: Allows {C:attention}Straights{} to be made with gaps of {C:attention}1 rank{}[s](ex: {C:attention}10 8 6 5 3{})

jokers.name: Showman
jokers.description: {C:attention}Joker{}, {C:tarot}Tarot{}, {C:planet}Planet{}, and {C:spectral}Spectral{} cards[s] may appear multiple times

jokers.name: Blackboard
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult if all cards {C:orange}held in hand{} are Spades or Clubs

jokers.name: Baron
jokers.description: Each {C:orange}King{} held in hand gives {X:red,C:white}X1.5{} Mult

jokers.name: Reserved Parking
jokers.description: Each {C:orange}face{} card held in hand has a {C:green}1 in 2{} chance to give {C:money}$1{}

jokers.name: Shoot the Moon
jokers.description: Each {C:orange}Queen{} held in hand gives {C:mult}+13{} Mult

jokers.name: Riff-Raff
jokers.description: When {C:orange}Blind{} is selected, create {C:orange}2{} {C:blue}Common{} {C:orange}Jokers{}[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

jokers.name: Madness
jokers.description: When {C:orange}Small Blind{} or {C:orange}Big Blind{} is selected, gain {X:red,C:white}X0.5{} Mult and {C:red}destroy{} a random Joker[s]{C:inactive}(Currently X1 Mult){}

jokers.name: Loyalty Card
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X4{} Mult every {C:attention}6{} hands played[s]{C:inactive}#1# remaining{}

jokers.name: Space Joker
jokers.description: {C:green}1 in 4{} chance to upgrade level of played {C:attention}poker hand{}

jokers.name: Ice Cream
jokers.description: {C:blue}+#1#{} Chips[s]{C:blue}-5{} Chips for every hand played

jokers.name: Green Joker
jokers.description: {C:red}+1{} Mult per hand played[s]{C:red}-1{} Mult per discard[s]{C:inactive}(Currently{} {C:red}+#1#{} {C:inactive}Mult){}

jokers.name: Cavendish
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X3{} Mult[s]{C:green}#1# in 1000{} chance this card is[s] destroyed at the end of round

jokers.name: Golden Joker
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$4{} at the end of round

jokers.name: Walkie Talkie
jokers.description: Each played {C:attention}10{} or {C:attention}4{} gives[s] {C:blue}+10{} Chips and {C:red}+4{} Mult when scored

jokers.name: Wee Joker
jokers.description: This Joker gains {C:blue}+8{} Chips when each played {C:attention}2{} is scored[s]{C:inactive}(Currently{} {C:blue}+#1#{} {C:inactive}Chips){}

jokers.name: Perkeo
jokers.description: Creates a {C:spectral}Negative{} copy of {C:attention}1{} random {C:attention}consumable{} card[s] in your possession at the end of the {C:attention}shop{}

jokers.name: Fortune Teller
jokers.description: {C:red}+1{} Mult per {C:tarot}Tarot{} card used this run[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:red}+#1#{}){}

jokers.name: Blue Joker
jokers.description: {C:blue}+2{} Chips for each remaining card in {C:attention}deck{}[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:blue}+#1#{} Chips){}

jokers.name: Joker Stencil
jokers.description: {X:red,C:white}X1{} Mult for each empty {C:attention}Joker{} slot.[s] Joker Stencil included[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{}){}

jokers.name: Raised Fist
jokers.description: Adds {C:attention}double{} the rank of[s] {C:attention}lowest{} ranked card held in hand to Mult

jokers.name: Steel Joker
jokers.description: Gives {X:red,C:white}X0.2{} Mult for each {C:attention}Stee Card{} in your {C:attention}full deck{}[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {X:red,C:white}X#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Abstract Joker
jokers.description: {C:red}+3{} Mult for each {C:attention}Joker{} card[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:red}+#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Supernova
jokers.description: Adds the number of times {C:attention}poker hand{} has[s] been played this run to Mult

jokers.name: Cloud 9
jokers.description: Earn {C:money}$1{} for each {C:attention}9{} in your {C:attention}full deck{} at end of round[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:money}$#1#{}){}

jokers.name: Stone Joker
jokers.description: Gives {C:blue}+25{} Chips for each {C:attention}Stone Card{} in your full deck[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:blue}+#1#{} Chips){}

jokers.name: Baseball Card
jokers.description: {C:uncommon}Uncommon{} Jokers each give {X:red,C:white}X1.5{} Mult

jokers.name: Swashbuckler
jokers.description: Adds the sell value of all other owned {C:attention}Jokers{} to Mult[s]{C:inactive}(Currently {C:red}+#1#{} Mult){}

jokers.name: Chicot
jokers.description: Disables effect of every {C:attention}Boss Blind{}

jokers.name: Luchador
jokers.description: Sell this card to disable the current {C:attention}Boss Blind{}

consumables.name: The Magician
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}2{} selected cards to {C:attention}Lucky Cards{}

consumables.name: The High Priestess
consumables.description: Creates up to {C:attention}2{} random {C:planet}Planet{} cards[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

consumables.name: The Empress
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}2{} selected cards to {C:attention}Mult Cards{}

consumables.name: The Emperor
consumables.description: Creates up to {C:attention}2{} random {C:tarot}Tarot{} cards[s]{C:inactive}(Must have room){}

consumables.name: The Hierophant
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}2{} selected cards to {C:attention}Bonus Cards{}

consumables.name: The Lovers
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}1{} selected card into a {C:attention}Wild Card{}

consumables.name: The Chariot
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}1{} selected card into a {C:attention}Steel Card{}

consumables.name: Justice
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}1{} selected card into a {C:attention}Glass Card{}

consumables.name: The Hermit
consumables.description: Doubles money[s]{C:inactive}(Max of {C:money}$20{}){}

consumables.name: Temperance
consumables.description: Gives the total sell value of all current Jokers[s]{C:inactive}(Max of {C:money}$50{}){}

consumables.name: The Devil
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}1{} selected card into a {C:attention}Gold Card{}

consumables.name: The Tower
consumables.description: Enhances {C:attention}1{} selected card into a {C:attention}Stone Card{}

consumables.name: The Hanged Man
consumables.description: Destroys up to {C:attention}2{} selected cards

consumables.name: The Star
